snippet.title: 13Z Early Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
We are excited to unveil Mixed Realms's fourth title, 13Z (pronounced "Thirteen-Z"), a roguelike multiplayer adventure inspired by the Zodiac.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348250/13Z/

It's a small departure from our usual hardcore action games with realistic visuals. In 13Z, we're embracing a whimsical 3rd-person perspective while staying true to our focus on deep combat mechanics.

Imagine a fusion of Hades and Risk of Rain 2 – that's the vision behind 13Z.
If this sounds like your kind of game, do add 13Z to your wishlist on Steam 🙂
